bangalore.description:
No of People Coming: Unknown At an impressionable age of three, Sachind used his imagination to draw fish and thus began his artistic journey. At the age of nine he drew a cockerel for a school assignment and he was reprimanded by his teacher because she was sure he had traced it. Being a lover of animals he used water colors to bring out the beauty of their creation.

Vehicle body styling and product designing fascinated his teen years. Unaided by any formal training, Sachind worked alone at his skill. His perfectionist nature, with an eye for detail, keeps him working on every dot and line of his artwork. His inherent interest in art and design caused him to also pursue graphic design and civil architecture. He designed the home of his parents, friends and also the home he now resides in.

bangalore.locationName: Ginserv Auditorium Global Incubation Services, CA Site No:1, Behind Hotel, Leela Palace Kempinski, HAL 3rd Stage, Kodihalli, Karntaka bangalore
bangalore.description: No of People Coming: Unknown  About the Talk Development has become synonymous with urbanization. Urbanization is widespread in India with nearly 42 % of its people to live in cities by 2030. While urban demand for food is supposed to get good prices for farm produce, cities also take land and water away from agriculture. All these affect the lives of small holders across the country who form 85% of our farming community. The talk will explore this phenomenon and explain the link between the political issue of agrarian distress on the one hand, and the problem of increasing degradation of urban environment on the other. About the Speaker  Amit Bhaduri has served as Professor of Political Economy at the University of Pavia, Italy, Reader at the Delhi School of Economics, and Professor at the Indian Institute of Management, Calcutta. bangalore.description:
No of People Coming: 39 A block chain or blockchain is a permission less distributed database based on the bitcoin protocol that maintains a continuously growing list of transactional data records hardened against tampering and revision, even by operators of the data store's nodes. The initial and most widely known application of the block chain technology is the public ledger of transactions for bitcoin which has been the inspiration for similar implementations often known as alt chains.

Bitcoin - the decentralised digital cryptocurrency powered by a vast computer network has a stable value around $250 for most of the year. Among regulators and financial institutions, scepticism has given way to enthusiasm (the European Union recently recognised it as a currency). The extraordinary potential of the blockchain, the technology significantly stretches far and beyond into crypto fintech innovation. bangalore.name: KUMARA PARVATHA (KP) TREK
bangalore.locationName: bangalore
bangalore.description:
No of People Coming: 3 Greetings from Adventure Adda,

CLIMB KUMARA PARVATHA FROM EASIEST SIDE AND STAY AT HOMESTAY NEAR BASE CAMP OF PUSHPAGIRI (SOMWARPET SIDE).. The Pushpagiri or Subramanya Hills (also referred as Kumaraparvatha) is the second highest peak of Kodagu, and sixth highest peak in Karnataka. About 36 kilometres from Somwarpet and 1.5 kilometres from Kumaralli, it is located amid the jungle. Trekking can be done from the base, Bhagati, which is a 10 km, three-hour walk. Otherwise, trekkers can cross Kukke Subramanya, located in Dakshina Kannada district of Pushpagiri Range. The trekking zone can be approached from Pushpagiri or from Kumaraparvata peaks.The Eastern entrance can be reached from Beedehalli via Heggademane temple and the Western entrance from Kukke Subramanya via Giri gadde. However, the entrance through Beedehalli is less strenuous.Monsoon is nature lovers and Trekkers celebration time. Make the best of this time to enjoy nature and challenge yourselves to what the adventure natur

bangalore.name: [Women Tour] Ladakh  To The Mystical Land Of High Passes
bangalore.locationName: Leh Leh Ladakhbangalore
bangalore.description:
No of People Coming: 3 There is a famous Ladakhi saying that the land is so barren and the passes so high that only our fiercest enemies or our best friends would want to visit us".

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gvX_9x9OmRk

Ladakh is a heart-warming example of how nature allows life amidst the harshest conditions. And the people in Ladakh are one with nature. One smile from them, while they work, and you feel your materialistic worries melt away. Must like the snow on the mountains you can see from your balcony.

When you cross the Khardung La at 5602m (18,379ft) and enter the stupendous Nubra Valley, you understand why it is the heaven on earth. Surrounded by the seemingly impenetrable Himalayas, the valley was once a hotbed of the thriving Trans-Himalayan trade.

The ever changing colors of Pangong Tso, makes you cry. And we narrate by experience. No religion of the world can give the peace and clarity you get by starting at those ever changing blue waters. Get your epiphany!

bangalore.name: IAM: Best Practices, Policy Language & Federation
bangalore.locationName: bangalore
bangalore.description:
No of People Coming: 78 Topic: IAM top 10 best practices [ Prashant Bapat, Apigee ]

With running of your operations on AWS comes the responsibility of ensuring the security and access control among other things. More often than not, users have too much permission than what is required to do their job. This talk takes you through the top 10 best practices for Identity and Access Management (IAM) that help you to stay secure.

Topic: IAM Federation [ Prashant Bapat, Apigee ]

Once your AWS footprint grows and if you are tasked with managing multiple AWS accounts and lots of different users on each of those accounts, access control will become a challenge in itself. This talk explores the options available for federating access to AWS using your own user database. We will also cover in some depth the SAML based federation to AWS. We will use FreeIPA as a user database and demo couple of scenarios.

Topic: Become an IAM Policy Ninja [ Anshul Sharma ]

bangalore.description:
No of People Coming: 5 About ToastmastersToastmasters International is a not-for-profit educational organization whose mission is to help people develop their communication skills. There are no instructors or professors and there are no tests or grading. A Toastmasters Club consists of 10 to 20 people who meet weekly throughout the year. Typically, the agenda of the club meeting has 3 major sections:1. Prepared SpeechesThe club member comes prepared to deliver his speech. This is a project speech & is towards certification.The best speaker is chosen by the audience. 2. Speech EvaluationAn evaluator is assigned to each speaker & a 2 - 3 minute evaluation on what went well & areas of improvement is shared in a constructive manner.

3. Table TopicsThis is an extempore speaking round. The table topic master will come prepared with 5-6 topics. Volunteers from the audience will come up & speak on the topic for 2-3 minutes.

Every meeting has the above sessions, as well as role players such as Gramm

bangalore.name: Discuss books on Mythology
bangalore.locationName: #82, 7th Main, 4th B Block near BDA complex, Koramangala Muffets And Tuffets, bangalore
bangalore.description:
No of People Coming: 6 As literature, the mythology offers complex, engaging, and often amusing entertainment. Even the brutal stories of Oedipus ,Orestes or Karna became famous standalone works of literature engaging readers for decades. The scientific aspect of the myths is most visible in those that attempt to explain certain phenomena Procne and Philomela (why the swallow has no song), and Hercules at Gibraltar (how the Rock of Gibraltar appeared) are classic examples.

The mythology also tries to answer a question that straddles the line between religion and morality. In this world, morality is cast in religious terms. Most of the best known mythslike those of The Mahabharata, Baldur, the Trojan War, deal with the cruelty and pain that even the greatest heroes face. Such stories make sense of the worlds senseless cruelty, demonstrating that, for whatever reason, the gods necessarily maintain a place for suffering in the world.

bangalore.name: Tambdi Surla Waterfalls Trek
bangalore.locationName: Bangalore Bangalore.bangalore
bangalore.description:
No of People Coming: 4 About the Destination:

Tambdi Surla is bound to take you back in time with its gripping Shiva Temple situated amidst dense thickets of the Bhagwan Mahavir National Park. Cut from basalt rock, the intricate design and architecture of this 12th century classic marvel is named after the village where it is situated. Its timeless beauty thats survived severe weather conditions barely looks ancient. With the present ambience of cobbled pathways and lining of Ashoka trees leading to the sanctum, the temple is said to have also survived several invasions from the Portuguese and other attacks.

Tambdi Surla is the oldest temple in Goa whose heritage value receives appreciation from visitors alike. A must see for its the only of its kind in the Kadamba-Yadava architecture that even today seems nearly impenetrable due to its location. Added to this dimension are many-a-local tales on the deity, the rulers, and a nearby waterfall, which makes Tambdi Surla a dream destination for any adventure se

This meetup is not just talking about happiness but actually analyzing yourself better and making our own life easer!

You are always growing and changing based upon your personality and life experiences. Therefore, its important to periodically take time out to conduct a self-analysis.

Self-analyses help you to reflect on where you are in various aspects of your life. Armed with this information, you are better prepared to make necessary adjustments as you move forward in your life

Everyone has the right to be happy.

Life is a journey - sometimes it's good and sometimes it's not. I have had my share of both and I want to help create more good stuff. The Self Analysis & Happiness Meetup is about increasing the positive happy times and finding ways to handle the bad stuff. It's an opportunity to meet new friends, learn new things, share experiences and create a more positive happy life.

bangalore.name: Building Big Data applications with Apache Beam and Apache Apex (native Hadoop)
bangalore.locationName: Online Webcastbangalore
bangalore.description:
No of People Coming: 20 The event will cover - Building streaming applications with Apache Beam and Apache Apex.

Apache Apex is a native Hadoop data in motion platform that is being used by customers for both streaming as well as batch processing. Common use cases include ingestion into Hadoop, streaming analytics, ETL, database off-loads, alerts and monitoring, machine model scoring, etc.

Agenda:

6:45am - Kenn Knowles, Software Engineer, Google & Apache Beam (incubating) PPMC member

7:30am - Q&A

7:45am - Siyuan Hua, Apache Apex Committer & DataTorrent Engineer

Abstract:

Talk 1: Apache Beam (incubating) is a programming model and library for unified batch & streaming big data processing. This talk will cover the Beam programming model broadly, including its origin story and vision for the future. We will dig into how Beam separates concerns for authors of streaming data processing pipelines, isolating what you want to compute from where your data is distributed in time and when you want

bangalore.name: Continuous Delivery on the Microsoft Platform
bangalore.locationName: 3rd Floor, INDIQUBE Alpha Buliding, Panathur Main Rd, Kodbisanhalli, Panathur,  Xpirit/Xebia Officebangalore
bangalore.description:
No of People Coming: 26 Becoming agile is one thing, but becoming competitive is another. Today, many organizations are already working on agile transformations. The next step is to provide value every day, on multiple moments of the day, as one continuous flow. This continuous flow of value is what is known as continuous delivery. Continuous Delivery has many aspects that an organization needs to get in place. It requires your organization to be agile. From that point on you can automate the different steps in the delivery process even further. The delivery process needs to be supported with a variety of tools.

Come and Join us to exchange ideas and dialogue on How can we achieve Continuos Delivery on Microsoft Platform - Step after next step.

We will have Speaker Marcel de Vries - MVP & Microsoft Regional Director and Alex Thissen - MVP from Netherlands to share their knowledge and experience on this topic.

Growth hacker has become a hot job title, because marketers need to increasingly become more technical (and vice versa). bangalore.description:
No of People Coming: 11 Topic - "Significance Testing For Quantitative Trading Strategies" , Adithya

Abstract : The talk will be about Algorithmic Trading which has been around forever with several automated systems floating around the trading world. In this meetup, we address one of the most common questions when it comes to trading algorithm development : How does one separate the grain from the chaff?

We show how basic statistics and statistical tests can be combined with hypotheses in the market in order to test the robustness of a system. We take a basic case study of a famous trading system : Best Day of the Week , and apply our methods to assess its robustness.

Speaker bio - Adithya has been developing trading algorithms for Indian markets. He is passionate about quantitative finance, algo trading and applied mathematics in general. Documentaries, by contrast, require only that students choose the subject matter and capture what is already there.Watching documentaries is a wonderful way to expand your awareness of the world around you. It forces us to view a specific problem from an array of different perspectives.

delhi.name: Truind Trek
delhi.locationName: Dharamshala Dharamshaladelhi
delhi.description:
No of People Coming: 3 1 Night and 2days Trek to Truind

Day 01: Trek from Mcleodganj Camp to Triund Via Gallu Temple (8 Kms till Truind and another 8 km till Laka Got and come back/ 6- 7 Hours/2975 Meters)

Report at the Base Camp (Shiv Shakti Retreat). You can come to Shiv Shakti retreat .Here you can freshen up and if you want to rest then can rest for a while before the Trek.Breakfast will be given(Optional) .

At around 10.30 am we will start our Trek to Truind.It is a beautiful walk through mixed forests of the deodar, oak and rhododendron. Triund is situated on a ridge with a beautiful view of whole Kangra valley on one side and Dhauladhar mountain range on the other side. First 2km is a steep ascent but there is a gradual ascent after Gallu Devi temple. The last 1 km is again a steep ascent through the forest. Triund is a flat meadow on top of a ridge. From here one can witness panoramic view of Dhauladhar range on one side and Kangra valley on the other is a memorable sight. Overnight stay in tents

delhi.locationName: delhi
delhi.description:
No of People Coming: 6 We invite you to join on the exclusive mind-blowing road trip to mini tibet, Spiti valley. This summer escape the heat and spend time exploring Spiti valley like never before

Looking forward to escorting you to the mystical land for eight days. We have designed this adventure to make your experience of Spiti valley memorable. Spend these 8 days experiencing high altitude lakes in moon light, meadows strewn with wild flowers, ancient monasteries and spectacular mountain passes with a view of frozen glaciers.

Spiti Valley means land between Tibet and Ladakh is also known as Little Tibet has stunning landscape of snow-capped peaks and sprawling valleys. The fertile lahaul is separated from Spiti valley by kunzum La, an enigmatic pass at 4551m/14790 ft. The scattered villages amid green barley fields and roaring Spiti river are constant companion running along the broad valley before turning south at Sumdo, into the gorges of Hangrang Valley.

This Sunday morning began with a jazz funk workshop, followed by a fitness drill by CRPF personnel, who displayed self-defence tactics and their prowess in Wushu, a Chinese martial art form.
